page.title: 01FAVERDALE BMX TRACK
page.content: ON FAVERDALE TRADING ESTATE DARLINGTON TOWN COUNCIL HAVE RECENTLY ERRECTED A B.M.X. TRACK. THE LETTERS B.M.X. STAND FOR BICYLE MOTOR CROSS.THIS IS QUITE A NEW SPORT WHICH HAS COME TO THIS COUNTRY FROM AMERICA AND THOUGH ADULTS TAKE PART IT IS ESPECIALLY POPULAR WITH CHILDREN.THE BICYCLES USED IN B.M.X. ARE SPECIALLY DESIGNED SO THAT THEY CAN RESIST THE ROUGH HANDLING WHICH IS NECESSARY WHEN B.M.X. RACING.DIFFERNCES BETWEEN A B.M.X. BIKE AND A CONVENTIONAL ONE INCLUDE STUDDED TYRES AND A SPECIALLY STRENGTHENED STEM BETWEEN THE FRAME AND THE HANDLE BARS NECESSARY FOR ABS0RBING SHOCK WHEN BICYCLE AND RIDER TAKE OFF AND LAND. THE RACE TRACK AT FAVERDALE IS MADE OF OF HARD PACKED DIRT.THE RACERS HAVE TO NEGOCIATE BENDS CALLED BURMS,HILLS,
